LandingPage.headline: Connect, Collaborate and Create
LandingPage.headline2: The open-source platform where developers find exciting projects and creators seek talented collaborators.
LandingPage.headline4: Discover innovative projects looking for passionate collaborators
LandingPage.how_work_1_desc: Create your profile and showcase your skills, experience, and previous projects.
LandingPage.how_work_2_desc: Search for interesting projects to collaborate on or publish your own idea.
LandingPage.how_work_3_desc: Connect with other developers and start building something amazing together.
LandingPage.headline6: Join our community of passionate developers and find your next collaborative project.
LandingPage.headline_footer: Connecting developers with open source projects since 2025           .
